mdRecord.dcterms:title: The border bandits, or The horse-thief's trail / [translated] by Francis Johnson
The border bandits
Gerstäcker, Friedrich, 1816-1872. Regulatoren in Arkansas. 13-25 Kapitel. English. 1870
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gerstäcker, Friedrich, 1816-1872
Johnson, Francis, 1837-1908
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Series numbering also given as: Second series, no. 24.
Translation of: Die Regulatoren in Arkansas (chapters 13-25)
Translation completed with: Alapha, the squaw, or The renegades of the border (chapters 1-12) and Assowaum, the avenger, or The destroyer's doom (chapters 26-39)
At foot of wrapper title: Powers & Brown Paper Co., Springfield.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Original pictorial orange wrappers.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Gift of C.W. Barrett.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Dime novels
